restaurants.name: The Purple Pig
restaurants.description: A wine bar and restaurant featuring cheese, swine, and wine on Chicago's Magnificent Mile. Known for innovative Mediterranean small plates.

restaurants.name: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Chicago's legendary deep-dish pizza. A family tradition since 1971, serving authentic Chicago-style pizza with a buttery crust.

restaurants.name: Girl & The Goat
restaurants.description: Chef Stephanie Izard's award-winning restaurant serving bold, globally-inspired dishes with local ingredients.

restaurants.name: Alinea
restaurants.description: Three Michelin-starred restaurant offering innovative, molecular gastronomy and an unforgettable dining experience.

restaurants.name: Portillo's Hot Dogs
restaurants.description: Iconic Chicago-style hot dogs, Italian beef sandwiches, and chocolate cake shakes. A local institution since 1963.

restaurants.name: Au Cheval
restaurants.description: Upscale diner known for having one of the best burgers in America. Expect a wait, but it's worth it.

restaurants.name: Gibsons Bar & Steakhouse
restaurants.description: Classic Chicago steakhouse with huge portions, premium steaks, and a legendary bar scene.

restaurants.name: Frontera Grill
restaurants.description: Rick Bayless' celebrated Mexican restaurant featuring authentic regional cuisine and creative margaritas.

restaurants.name: The Publican
restaurants.description: Beer-focused restaurant with pork-centric menu, fresh oysters, and communal dining experience.

restaurants.name: Smoque BBQ
restaurants.description: Award-winning Texas-style barbecue in Chicago. Smoked daily, served until sold out.
